data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Hertha at Borussia-Park.
Hertha to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Robert Hartmann awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Robert Hartmann signals a Hertha throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Hertha.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Hertha awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Hartmann signals a Hertha throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 10, Hertha advance rapidly upfield but Robert Hartmann blows for offside.
Hertha have a goal kick.
Throw-in Hertha.
In the minute 12, Free kick Hertha.
Oscar Wendt (M´gladbach) has received a yellow card from Robert Hartmann.
Hertha to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 14, Hertha push forward at Borussia-Park and Dodi Lukebakio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined M´gladbach defence.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 20, Robert Hartmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Hertha.
In the minute 22, Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hertha have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 26, Can M´gladbach capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Borussia-Park, Peter Pekarik has been yellow-carded for the away team.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
M´gladbach's Florian Neuhaus attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Can Hertha capitalize from this throw-in deep inside M´gladbach's half?
Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 32, M´gladbach's Breel Embolo gets in a shot on goal at Borussia-Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hertha's Krzysztof Piatek gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Hertha.
Free kick for Hertha in the half of M´gladbach.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Hertha have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 36, Hertha pushes forward through Peter Pekarik, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hertha have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
In Monchengladbach, Dedryck Boyata (Hertha) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 37, Robert Hartmann awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Robert Hartmann signals a throw-in for M´gladbach, close to Hertha's area.
Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 42, Hannes Wolf for M´gladbach drives towards goal at Borussia-Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 43, Valentino Lazaro (M´gladbach) gets a yellow card.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for M´gladbach in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 45, Robert Hartmann signals a throw-in for M´gladbach, close to Hertha's area.
M´gladbach's Denis Zakaria misses with an attempt on goal.
Hertha have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Monchengladbach.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Hertha in the half of M´gladbach.
Matteo Guendouzi is on target to give Hertha a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 47, Vladimir Darida instrumental with a fine assist.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hertha's half?
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 50, M´gladbach push upfield but Robert Hartmann quickly pulls them for offside.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Hertha have an attacking throw-in.
Hertha's Vladimir Darida gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
In the minute 51, Hertha to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 53, Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Hertha in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match at Borussia-Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nico Elvedi, who is down injured.
In the minute 55, Nico Elvedi is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
Hertha have a dangerous throw-in.
Hannes Wolf for M´gladbach gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Hertha at Borussia-Park.
Throw-in for Hertha at Borussia-Park.
Hertha are caught offside.
In the minute 61, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach drive upfield and Patrick Herrmann gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hertha defender.
Free kick M´gladbach.
In the minute 63, Patrick Herrmann gets his shot on target but fails to score for M´gladbach.
M´gladbach have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Hertha is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Alassane Plea is on a sub for Patrick Herrmann for M´gladbach.
Marcus Thuram is replacing Ibrahima Traore for the home team.
Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a third substitution, with Stefan Lainer replacing Oscar Wendt.
In the minute 66, In Monchengladbach Hertha drive forward through Dodi Lukebakio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in high up the field for Hertha in Monchengladbach.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 68, Robert Hartmann signals a Hertha throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matteo Guendouzi (Hertha) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 69, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Breel Embolo grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Borussia-Park.
Matthias Ginter with an assist there.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to M´gladbach just outside Hertha's area.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hertha's half?
In the minute 75, Bruno Labbadia is making the team's first substitution at Borussia-Park with Lucas Tousart replacing Vladimir Darida.
The away team have replaced Dodi Lukebakio with Mathew Leckie. This is the second substitution made today by Bruno Labbadia.
Jessic Ngankam is replacing Javairo Dilrosun for Hertha at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Hertha.
Robert Hartmann awards the away team a throw-in.
Robert Hartmann signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Hertha's half.
In the minute 78, In Monchengladbach M´gladbach attack through Marcus Thuram. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Hertha goal kick.
Throw-in for Hertha in their own half.
In the minute 79, Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to Hertha.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hertha at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 80, Florian Neuhaus (M´gladbach) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Free kick Hertha.
Florian Neuhaus is booked for the home team.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 84, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
M´gladbach's Stefan Lainer breaks free at Borussia-Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Robert Hartmann awards Hertha a goal kick.
In the minute 85, In Monchengladbach Hertha attack through Daishawn Redan. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
In the minute 85, The home team have replaced Florian Neuhaus with Laszlo Benes. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marco Rose.
M´gladbach make their fifth substitution with Lars Stindl replacing Hannes Wolf.
The away team replace Krzysztof Piatek with Daishawn Redan.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 87, Robert Hartmann awards the away team a throw-in.
Important block from the Hertha defence as Laszlo Benes fires in a strike for M´gladbach.
Throw-in Hertha.
Robert Hartmann signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Robert Hartmann.
Free kick for Hertha in their own half.
Hertha have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
